pcInfo.maxPcLevel: 您拥有最高个人电脑级别
pcInfo.temporaryPower: 您从贏胜游戏來获得的力量只是暂时的，每个游戏都有自己的24小时计时器。
pcInfo.cooldown: 游戏的冷却时间随着游戏难度的增加而增加。
pcInfo.externalSoftware: 如因任何外部软件使用脚本和Rollercoin中的服务将导致该帐户永久禁止或帐户余额冻结。

winning.title: By winning games, you have a chance to receive one of the following items:
winning.text1: x2 Power time hold from the game
winning.text3: x2 Power reward from the game

play.powerRemain: 算力将在未来保持有效
play.powerWhenYouWin: Mining Power is added only when you win the game.

captcha.enterCaptchaTitle: 开始游戏前请在時间內输入验证码。
